channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged menus

item.title: Is there a way for me to have collapsed menus on startup in Quest?
item.description:
I just find it tiring on startup to collapse the several menus that contain dozens of items, so is there a way for me to change this so when I start up Quest the lists will be collapsed on the left hand side of the screen?
I found out if you right click it there is a collapse all option... duh!
